CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Flechette
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Cartridge full of little sharp darts or pellets designed to penetrate armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: AP slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Like a slugshot, but with much more power and penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Ionized heated to big temperatures concentrated gas.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High-explosive bolts
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: High-explosive bolts used only by PMC due it's really heavy weight.
